Package inair.view

Contain all declaration views of inAiR system

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UIViewManager
    Interface to let you add and remove child views to an Layout.
    UIViewParent
    Defines the responsibilities for a class that will be a parent of a View.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ItemChangedEventArgs
    Arguments for the some event of collection view such as UIListView.HighlightItemProperty
    ItemEventArgs
    Arguments for the some event of collection view such as UIAbstractCollectionView.itemAdded
    PositionChangedEventArgs
    Arguments for UIView.PositionXProperty, UIView.PositionYProperty, UIView.PositionZProperty
    SizeChangedEventArgs
    Arguments for the SizeChanged event of UIView
    UIAbstractCollectionView
    Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items
    UIAbstractViewItem
    Represents a view that can be used to present an item on collection views see UIAbstractCollectionView
    UIAnimation
    This class contain all utilities method to create view's animation in inAiR framework
    UIImageView
    Displays an arbitrary image, such as an icon.
    UILayeredNavigationView
    Layout manager that allows the user to flip near and far through pages of data.
    UILayeredViewItem
    Present a single layer of layered navigation view see UILayeredNavigationView
    UIListView
    Arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented vertically.
    UIListViewItem
    Present a single list view item of layered navigation view see UIListView
    UIMenuView
    Represent a menu control that arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented vertically.
    UIMenuViewItem
    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co.
    UIRectView
    UIRectView presents a rectangle with fill color background
    UIState
    Note this class is currently under early design and development.
    UITextView
    Displays text to the user.
    UIView
    This class represents the basic building block for user interface components.
    UIViewGroup
    A UIViewGroup is a special view that can contain other views (called children.)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PositionChangedEventArgs.PositionChangedAction
    All action of this position changed event, maybe happened
    SizeChangedEventArgs.SizeChangedAction
    All action of this size changed event, maybe happened
